items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: M3U Playlist Proxy is a lightweight server that lets you stream, customize, and manage IPTV M3U playlists with ease. Whether you're cleaning up bloated channel lists, adding authentication to protect your stream, or just want a better way to serve your playlists — this tool gives you full control. With built-in support for filtering, and more
items.title: DisabledAbel/M3U-playlist-porxy: M3U Playlist Proxy is a lightweight server that lets you stream, customize, and manage IPTV M3U playlists with ease. Whether you're cleaning up bloated channel lists, adding authentication to protect your stream, or just want a better way to serve your playlists — this tool gives you full control. With built-in support for filtering, and more

items.content_html: HabitHub is a Chrome Extension focused on helping users develop strong, consistent habits through a lightweight and gamified experience. The extension offers streak-based progression, habit unlocking mechanisms, and actionable reminders—all embedded seamlessly in the browser.
items.title: NehakumariRai/HabitHub-HackHazards: HabitHub is a Chrome Extension focused on helping users develop strong, consistent habits through a lightweight and gamified experience. The extension offers streak-based progression, habit unlocking mechanisms, and actionable reminders—all embedded seamlessly in the browser.

items.content_html: Robin is a lightweight API testing platform built with Next.js and MikroORM. It allows developers to send and test HTTP APIs. seamlessly and view real-time responses. Built for speed and simplicity, Robin helps you test and debug APIs with ease.
items.title: Aman-web-dev/Robin: Robin is a lightweight API testing platform built with Next.js and MikroORM. It allows developers to send and test HTTP APIs. seamlessly and view real-time responses.  Built for speed and simplicity, Robin helps you test and debug APIs with ease.
